CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1962, pg. A18, reads: "Etta James Revue Set for Memorial Hall - The Bill Powell Annual Pittsburgher Awards presentation will be held on April 27, at the Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall in Oakland, 8p.m...A gigantic show has been planned for the event on April 27...The star-studded show will be headed by songstress Etta James...Etta James Revue consists of J.C. Davis and Band..."
TitMainTitle: Singer Etta James at microphone, performing with backup singers and J. C. Davis band, on stage at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
